vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ModuleSelfAuth.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.7.6 (ModuleSelfAuth.sol#4): it allows old versions
